channel.title: tech fun on Hanno Kase
channel.description: Recent content in tech fun on Hanno Kase

item.title: Automatic documentation
item.description: At the beginning of PhD I used to have at most one project at a time. Keeping track of things was easy. Along the way, I accumulated a portfolio of projects. For each of them I write tons of codes (partly because my programmer sister has taught me that having one big file with everything is bad). One day I found myself looking at my own code of three months earlier and spending half a day to retrace its logic. There were dozens of errors before I was able to run everything smoothly without forgetting some annoying little detail.
